#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<assert.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pi acos(-1)
#define inf 1000000007
#define mod 1000000007
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define x first
#define y second
#define N 1000010

#define DBG(vari) cerr<<#vari<<"="<<(vari)<<endl;
#define FOREACH(i,t) for(typeof(t.begin()) i=t.begin();i!=t.end();i++)

int p[10001],q[10000];
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,T,n;
	int t=0;
	for(i=2;i<=10000;i++)
	{
		if(!p[i])q[t++]=i,p[i]=i-1;
		for(j=0;j<t;j++)
		{
			if(q[j]*i>10000)break;
			if(i%q[j]==0)
			{
				p[i*q[j]]=p[i]*q[j];
				break;
			}
			else p[i*q[j]]=p[i]*(q[j]-1);
		}
	}
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%d\n",p[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
